name: Tik Tak Attack
description:
Tic Tac Attack is a Tic Tac Toe like puzzle game with the same goal to match three of the same colored pieces. The twist is the pieces are lovable animals, and can brutally attack one another. The order goes:

Bear 🐻 > Wolf 🐺 > Bird 🐦 > Mouse 🐁

Being a puzzle game, use strategy to beat a friend in local multiplayer, or just by yourself against the computer
